# Bio <br>
Hello, and thanks for stopping by! <br>

My name is Jana. I am passionate about leveraging big data in order to make meaningful business decisions. Originally from the Bay Area, I am currently living in New York City, pursuing my Master of Public Health in Epidemiology & Applied Biostatistics at Columbia University. I am a health advocate passionate about the intersection of technology, clinical analytics, and strategy. <br>
